text: Matt Walsh (born June 18, 1986) is an American right-wing political commentator and podcast host. He hosts the podcast The Matt Walsh Show, and appears on the American conservative website The Daily Wire. Walsh has wrote four books and starred in The Daily Wire documentary films What Is a Woman? and Am I Racist?. In 2022, Walsh wrote a childrens book called Johnny the Walrus, he compared being transgender to pretending to be a walrus. == Filmography == Year Title Type Role Notes 2022 What Is a Woman?
